Open positions

We are continuously looking for new group members with passion, talent, and grit!

People with a strong experimental background, a healthy appetite for theoretical challenges and the desire to learn new skills in a dynamic environment should apply. It’s a plus if you already have some experience in optics, cryogenics, microwave circuits, finite element simulations or microfabrication but not a requirement – these are all techniques you will learn when working with us!

We currently have one open PhD and one Postdoc position and are always happy hear from prospective Master students. If you have more questions please feel free to send me an email. Looking forward to hearing from you!

© 2019 Groeblacher Lab. Site forked from Allan Lab project.

We are part of the Kavli Institute of Nanoscience at the Department of Quantum Nanoscience at Delft University of Technology.

Funding:
- Vidi and Projectruimte grants from NWO
- Frontier of Nanosciences, a gravity program from NWO
- ERC starting grant
